# AlertConfiguration.AlertSound

**Structure**

An object that describes the sound to play for a Live Activity update alert.

## Declaration

```swift
struct AlertSound
```

## Configuring the alert sound

- **named(_:)**: A function you use to configure a custom sound for a Live Activity update alert.
- **default**: A value that represents the system’s default alert sound.

## Configuring Live Activity alerts

- **init(title:body:sound:)**: Initializes a new alert configuration for a Live Activity update.
- **title**: A short title that describes the purpose of the Live Activity update on Apple Watch.
- **body**: The main text that appears on the alert for a Live Activity update on Apple Watch.
- **sound**: The sound the system plays when the Live Activity alert appears on a person’s device.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
